dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 275.6 x 101 cm (9 ft. 1/2 in. x 39 3/4 in.)
Repeat H: 38.7 cm (15 1/4 in.)
title: Laotian Ikat
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic gimp
Technique: wefts are dyed with tied resist (weft ikat)
description: Bands of alternately s and z diagonals in orange-yellow and pink, separated by narrow gray and ivory ikat bands in solid hot pink, yellow, and metallic pink. Fine magenta warps create a changing color and surface effect.
name: Textile
